Project Settings
================

.. automodule:: capstone_portfolio.settings
   :members:
   :undoc-members:

Configuration Notes
-------------------

* ``DJANGO_ALLOWED_HOSTS`` — Comma-separated list of permitted hosts.
* ``STATIC_ROOT`` and ``MEDIA_ROOT`` — Preconfigured paths for collectstatic and
  user uploads.
* ``LOGGING`` — Streams structured logs to stdout via the console handler.
